document.full_text: if ever there was an indicator of a rebel force in disarray it was this: a lone libyan rebel in uniform on the highway leading away from the battlefield, unarmed, almost dazed, separated from his unit, trying to hitch a ride.
document.title: at war: a libyan rebel in need of a lift
lines_and_colors: if ever there was an indicator of a rebel force in disarray it was this: a lone libyan rebel in uniform on the highway leading away from the battlefield, unarmed, almost dazed, separated from his unit, trying to hitch a ride.
